properties.name: camel.dataformat.beanio.bean-reader-error-handler-type
properties.description: To use a custom org.apache.camel.dataformat.beanio.BeanIOErrorHandler as error handler while parsing. Configure the fully qualified class name of the error handler. Notice the options ignoreUnidentifiedRecords, ignoreUnexpectedRecords, and ignoreInvalidRecords may not be in use when you use a custom error handler.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.beanio.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the beanio data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.beanio.encoding
properties.description: The charset to use. Is by default the JVM platform default charset.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.beanio.mapping
properties.description: The BeanIO mapping file. Is by default loaded from the classpath. You can prefix with file:, http:, or classpath: to denote from where to load the mapping file.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.beanio.stream-name
properties.description: The name of the stream to use.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.beanio.unmarshal-single-object
properties.description: This options controls whether to unmarshal as a list of objects or as a single object only. The former is the default mode, and the latter is only intended in special use-cases where beanio maps the Camel message to a single POJO bean.
